about_the_game:
Welcome to Cafe Haven, a cozy cafe management game. Whether you dream of crafting the perfect menu, managing a talented team, or designing a cafe that’s uniquely yours, Cafe Haven lets you do it all.

Unlock & Perfect Recipes

Delight your customers with culinary perfection!

  • Unlock a variety of recipes as your cafe grows.

  • Use customer reviews to refine your dishes, adjusting ingredient quantities for the perfect flavor.

  • Perfecting recipes doesn’t just make your customers happy—it boosts your cafe’s popularity and helps your business thrive!

Staff Management

Your team is the backbone of your cafe.

  • Hire skilled employees to ensure smooth and efficient service.

  • Keep an eye on staff happiness and fatigue—overworked employees might call in sick or even quit!

  • As your cafe rating improves, expand your team and create effective work schedules to handle the growing demand.

Decorate Your Cafe

Transform your cafe into a cozy haven that reflects your unique style!

  • Unlock a variety of decorations as your cafe earns higher ratings.

  • Customize the look and feel of your cafe to attract customers and create a welcoming atmosphere.

  • Design a space that’s as beautiful as it is functional.

Maintain Your Cafe

Stay on your toes to keep things running smoothly!

  • Tackle random events like trash buildup, floor spills, and even equipment fires in real time.

  • Keep your customers happy and your employees productive by resolving these challenges quickly.

  • Every action counts in maintaining a clean, safe, and efficient environment.


Cafe Haven is a perfect blend of strategy, creativity, and cozy charm. Whether you’re perfecting recipes, managing your team, or building the cafe of your dreams, every decision shapes the story of your cafe. Will you rise to become the most beloved cafe in town?

Your Cafe Haven journey begins now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4:3 unsupported. If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.
